TID_SPELL_INFO_LIGHTNING: Bolts of lightning damage and stun up to three enemy troops or buildings with the most hitpoints in the target area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_RAGE: Increases troop movement and attack speed. Buildings attack faster and summon troops quicker, too. Chaaaarge!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_CURSE: And thrice were their afflictions... nixed, vexed, and hexed!\n\nEnemy troops in the area will receive extra damage from attacks and become Goblins when destroyed. Deals damage to enemies over time.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_HUNTER: Be very, very quiet.\n\nEvolved Hunter throws a Net at the closest Troop, making them unable to move or attack. If that Troop is flying, they can be attacked as though they were on the ground.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_WITCH: Witch's Skeletons are willing to sacrifice themselves for their beloved leader, lending their souls to heal her when they're destroyed.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_HUT_REWORK: Defensive building that spawns Spear Goblins when enemies are in range. Don't look inside... you don't want to see how they're made.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_FIRE_SPIRIT_HUT: All fired up! When it's hot and attacking, Evolved Furnace summons Fire Spirits even faster from hat to hearth.
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_UNEARNED_202508: Earn by playing August Arenas or Ranked
TID_SPELL_INFO_VINES: Entangle the three highest hitpoint troops or buildings in the area, stunning them while doing damage. If the troop is in the air, they'll ground them. \n\nDon't worry, they'll grow on you!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_BABY_DRAGON: That's a big baby! While attacking, Evo Baby Dragon creates a gust of wind that speeds up friendly troops and slows down enemies in the area. It's a wind-win situation!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_UNEARNED_202509: Earn by playing September Arenas or Ranked
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202509_1: You reached Seasonal Arena 4 in September!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202509_2: You reached Seasonal Arena 5 in September!
TID_INFO_ARENA_KING_OF_THE_HILL: King of the Hill Arena Info
TID_SPELL_INFO_ANGRY_BARBARIANS: Spawns a pair of leveled up Barbarians. They're like regular Barbarians, only harder, better, faster and stronger.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ARCHERS: A pair of lightly armored ranged attackers. They'll help you take down ground and air units, but you're on your own with hair coloring advice.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ARROWS: Arrows pepper a large area, damaging all enemies hit. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ASSASSIN: The Bandit dashes to her target and delivers an extra big hit! While dashing, she can't be touched. The mask keeps her identity safe, and gives her bonus cool points!
TID_SPELL_INFO_AXEMAN: He throws his axe like a boomerang, striking all enemies on the way out AND back. It's a miracle he doesn't lose an arm.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BABY_DRAGON: Burps fireballs from the sky that deal area damage. Baby dragons hatch cute, hungry and ready for a barbeque.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BALLOON: As pretty as they are, you won't want a parade of THESE balloons showing up on the horizon. Drops powerful bombs and when shot down, crashes dealing area damage.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BARBARIAN_HUT: Building that periodically spawns Barbarians to fight the enemy. Time to make the Barbarians!
TID_SPELL_INFO_BARBARIAN_LOG: It rolls over and damages anything in its path, then breaks open and out pops a Barbarian! How did he get inside?!
TID_SPELL_INFO_BARBARIANS: A horde of melee attackers with mean mustaches and even meaner tempers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BATS: Spawns a handful of tiny flying creatures. Think of them as sweet, purple... balls of DESTRUCTION!
TID_SPELL_INFO_BATTLE_RAM: Two Barbarians holding a big log charge at the nearest building, dealing significant damage if they connect; then they go to town with their swords!
TID_SPELL_INFO_BATTLEHEALER: With each attack, she unleashes a powerful healing aura that restores Hitpoints to herself and friendly Troops.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BETAMINIONS: A pair of long-range tough Minions
TID_SPELL_INFO_BLACKSMITH: Grants attack buffs to nearby allies*
TID_SPELL_INFO_BLOWDART_GOBLIN: Runs fast, shoots far and chews gum. How does he blow darts with a mouthful of Double Trouble Gum? Years of didgeridoo lessons.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BOMB_TOWER: Defensive building that houses a Bomber. Deals area damage to anything dumb enough to stand near it.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BOMBER: Small, lightly protected skeleton who throws bombs. Deals area damage that can wipe out a swarm of enemies.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ROYAL_DELIVERY:
No need to sign for this package!

Dropped from the sky, it deals Area Damage to enemy Troops before delivering a Royal Recruit.

The empty box is also handy for espionage.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BOWLER: This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks. His massive boulders roll through their target, hitting everything behind for a strike!
TID_SPELL_INFO_CANNON: Defensive building. Shoots cannonballs with deadly effect, but cannot target flying troops.
TID_SPELL_INFO_CLONE: Duplicates all friendly troops in the target area. Cloned troops are fragile, but pack the same punch as the original! Doesn't affect buildings.
TID_SPELL_INFO_DARK_PRINCE: The Dark Prince deals area damage and lets his spiked club do the talking for him - because when he does talk, it sounds like he has a bucket on his head.
TID_SPELL_INFO_DARK_WITCH: Summons Bats to do her bidding! If you get too close, she's not afraid of pitching in with her mean-looking battle staff.
TID_SPELL_INFO_DART_BARRELL: The Master Builder has sent his first contraption to the Arena! It's a fast and fun flying machine, but fragile!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EARTHQUAKE: Deals Damage per second to Troops and Crown Towers. Deals huge Building Damage! Does not affect flying units (it is an EARTHquake, after all).
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELECTRO_DRAGON: Spits out bolts of electricity hitting up to three targets. Suffers from middle child syndrome to boot.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELECTRO_GIANT: He channels electricity through his Zap Pack, a unique device that stuns and damages any Troop attacking him within its range.\n\nDon't tell him that his finger guns aren't real! He'll zap you.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELECTRO_WIZARD: He lands with a \qPOW!\q, stuns nearby enemies and shoots lightning with both hands! What a show off.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELITE_ARCHER: Not quite a Wizard, nor an Archer - he shoots a magic arrow that passes through and damages all enemies in its path. It's not a trick, it's magic!
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELIXIR_COLLECTOR: You gotta spend Elixir to make Elixir! This building makes 8 Elixir over its Lifetime. Does not appear in your starting hand.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELIXIR_GOLEM: Splits into two Elixir Golemites when destroyed, which split into two sentient Blobs when defeated. Each part of the Elixir Golem gives your opponent some Elixir when destroyed!
TID_SPELL_INFO_FIRE_SPIRIT_HUT: The Furnace spawns one Fire Spirit at a time. It also makes great brick-oven pancakes.
TID_SPELL_INFO_FIRE_SPIRITS: The Fire Spirit is on a mission to give you a warm hug. It'd be adorable if it wasn't on fire.
TID_SPELL_INFO_FIREBALL: Annnnnd... Fireball. Incinerates a small area, dealing high damage. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_FIRECRACKER: Shoots a firework that explodes upon impact, damaging the target and showering anything directly behind it with sparks. This is what happens when Archers get bored!
TID_SPELL_INFO_FISHERMAN: His Ranged Attack can pull enemies towards him, and pull himself to enemy buildings. He's also mastered the ancient art of 'Fish Slapping'.
TID_SPELL_INFO_FLYING_MACHINE: The Master Builder has sent his first contraption to the Arena! It's a fast and fun flying machine, but fragile!
TID_SPELL_INFO_FREEZE: Freezes and damages enemy troops and buildings, making them unable to move or attack. Everybody chill. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GHOST: He drifts invisibly through the Arena until he's startled by an enemy... then he attacks! Then he's invisible again! Zzzz.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GIANT: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. A real one-man wrecking crew!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GIANT_SKELETON: The bigger the skeleton, the bigger the bomb. Carries a bomb that blows up when the Giant Skeleton dies.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_BARREL: Spawns three Goblins anywhere in the Arena. It's going to be a thrilling ride, boys!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_GANG: Spawns six Goblins - three with knives, three with spears - at a discounted Elixir cost. It's like a Goblin Value Pack!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_GIANT: This jolly green Goblin Giant stomps towards enemy buildings. He carries two Spear Goblins everywhere he goes. It's a weird but functional arrangement.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_HUT: Building that spawns Spear Goblins. Don't look inside... you don't want to see how they're made.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLINCAGE: When the Goblin Cage is destroyed, a Goblin Brawler is unleashed into the Arena! Goblin Brawler always skips leg day.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLINS: Four fast, unarmored melee attackers. Small, fast, green and mean!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOLEM: Slow but durable, only attacks buildings. When destroyed, explosively splits into two Golemites and deals area damage!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GRAVEYARD: Surprise! It's a party. A Skeleton party, anywhere in the Arena. Yay!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GUARD_BATTALION: Deploys a line of recruits armed with spears, shields and wooden buckets. They dream of ponies and one day wearing metal buckets.
TID_SPELL_INFO_HEAL: Heal your troops to keep them in the fight! Friendly troops are healed over time while in the target area. Doesn't affect buildings.
TID_SPELL_INFO_HEAL_SPIRIT:
A mischievous Spirit that leaps at enemies, dealing Damage and leaving behind a powerful healing effect that restores Hitpoints to friendly Troops!

R.I.P. Heal
2017 - 2020
Alas, we hardly used ye.
TID_SPELL_INFO_HOG_RIDER: Fast melee troop that targets buildings and can jump over the river. He followed the echoing call of \qHog Riderrrrr\q all the way through the Arena doors.
TID_SPELL_INFO_HOGSTABLES: Spawns Royal Hogs quickly over a short period of time*
TID_SPELL_INFO_HOODED_GANG: Spawns a mischievous trio of Rascals! The boy takes the lead, while the girls pelt enemies from behind... with slingshots full of Double Trouble Gum!
TID_SPELL_INFO_HUNTER: He deals BIG damage up close - not so much at range. What he lacks in accuracy, he makes up for with his impressively bushy eyebrows.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ICE_SPIRITS: Spawns one lively little Ice Spirit to freeze a group of enemies. Stay frosty.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ICE_WIZARD: This chill caster throws ice shards that slow down enemies' movement and attack speed. Despite being freezing cold, he has a handlebar mustache that's too hot for TV.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ICEDRAGON: Spits a row of slowing attacks*
TID_SPELL_INFO_ICEGOLEMITE: He's tough, targets buildings and explodes when destroyed, slowing nearby enemies. Made entirely out of ice... or is he?! Yes.
TID_SPELL_INFO_INFERNO: Defensive building, roasts targets for damage that increases over time. Burns through even the biggest and toughest enemies!
TID_SPELL_INFO_INFERNO_DRAGON: Shoots a focused beam of fire that increases in damage over time. Wears a helmet because flying can be dangerous.
TID_SPELL_INFO_KNIGHT: A tough melee fighter. The Barbarian's handsome, cultured cousin. Rumor has it that he was knighted based on the sheer awesomeness of his mustache alone.
TID_SPELL_INFO_LAVA_HOUND: The Lava Hound is a majestic flying beast that attacks buildings. The Lava Pups are less majestic angry babies that attack anything.
TID_SPELL_INFO_LOG: A spilt bottle of Rage turned an innocent tree trunk into \qThe Log\q. Now, it seeks revenge by crushing anything in its path! Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MASTERBUILDER: Summons more machines with each stage. Zappie → Zappies → Sparky → MK/Flying Machine*
TID_SPELL_INFO_MEGAKNIGHT: He lands with the force of 1,000 mustaches, then jumps from one foe to the next dealing huge area damage. Stand aside!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MEGAMINION: Flying, armored and powerful. What could be its weakness?! Cupcakes.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MINER: The Miner can burrow his way underground and appear anywhere in the Arena. It's not magic, it's a shovel. A shovel that deals reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MINI_ZAPMACHINE: Spawns a pack of miniature Zap machines. Who controls them...? Only the Master Builder knows.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_DRILL: Building capable of burrowing underground and appearing anywhere in the Arena. Spawns Goblins one at a time until destroyed. Then spawns a few more, to make sure everything nearby has been properly stabbed.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MINION_HORDE: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MINIONHIVE: Spawns Minions quickly over a short period of time*
TID_SPELL_INFO_MINIONS: Three fast, unarmored flying attackers. Roses are red, minions are blue, they can fly, and will crush you!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MINIPEKKA: The Arena is a certified butterfly-free zone. No distractions for P.E.K.K.A, only destruction.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MIRROR: Mirrors your last card played for +1 Elixir. Does not appear in your starting hand.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MONK: Monk has spent many isolated years perfecting a new style of combat.\n\nHe fires off a 3-hit combo, with the last blow dealing extra Damage and pushing enemies back!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MORTAR: Defensive building with a long range. Shoots big boulders that deal area damage, but cannot hit targets that get too close!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MOVING_CANNON: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Once you break its shield, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MUSKETEER: Don't be fooled by her delicately coiffed hair, the Musketeer is a mean shot with her trusty boomstick.
TID_SPELL_INFO_PEKKA: A heavily armored, slow melee fighter. Swings from the hip, but packs a huge punch.
TID_SPELL_INFO_POISON: Covers the area in a deadly toxin, damaging enemy troops and buildings over time. Yet somehow leaves the grass green and healthy. Go figure! Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_PRINCE: Don't let the little pony fool you. Once the Prince gets a running start, you WILL be trampled. Deals double damage once he gets charging.
TID_SPELL_INFO_PRINCESS: This stunning Princess shoots flaming arrows from long range. If you're feeling warm feelings towards her, it's probably because you're on fire.
TID_SPELL_INFO_RAGE_BARBARIAN: He chops trees by day and hunts The Log by night. His bottle of Rage spills everywhere when he's defeated.
TID_SPELL_INFO_RAM_RIDER: Together they charge through the Arena; snaring enemies, knocking down towers ... and chewing grass!?
TID_SPELL_INFO_ROCKET: Deals high damage to a small area. Looks really awesome doing it. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ROYAL_GIANT: Destroying enemy buildings with his massive cannon is his job; making a raggedy blond beard look good is his passion.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ROYAL_HOGS: The King's personal pets are loose! They love to chomp on apples and towers alike - who let the hogs out?!
TID_SPELL_INFO_SKELETON_BALLOON: It's a Skeleton party in the sky, until all the balloons pop... then it's a Skeleton party on the ground!
TID_SPELL_INFO_SKELETON_HORDE: Spawns an army of Skeletons. Meet Larry and his friends Harry, Gerry, Terry, Mary, etc.
TID_SPELL_INFO_SKELETON_WARRIORS: Three ruthless bone brothers with shields. Knock off their shields and all that's left are three ruthless bone brothers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_SKELETONDRAGONS: This pair of skeletal scorchers deal Area Damage and fly above the Arena. They also play a mean rib cage xylophone duet.
TID_SPELL_INFO_SKELETONS: Three fast, very weak melee fighters. Surround your enemies with this pile of bones!
TID_SPELL_INFO_SMASHER: Smashes the ground, dealing AOE damage and slowing move/attack speed*
TID_SPELL_INFO_SNOWBALL: It's HUGE! Once it began rolling down Frozen Peak, there was no stopping it. Enemies hit are knocked back and slowed down. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_SPEAR_GOBLINS: Three unarmored ranged attackers. Who the heck taught these guys to throw spears!? Who thought that was a good idea?!
TID_SPELL_INFO_SPEARS: Toss a pile of Goblin Spears onto the enemies
TID_SPELL_INFO_TESLA: Defensive building. Whenever it's not zapping the enemy, the power of Electrickery is best kept grounded.
TID_SPELL_INFO_THREE_MUSKETEERS: Trio of powerful, independent markswomen, fighting for justice and honor. Disrespecting them would not be just a mistake, it would be a cardinal sin!
TID_SPELL_INFO_TOMBSTONE: Building that periodically spawns Skeletons to fight the enemy... and when destroyed, spawns 4 more Skeletons! Creepy!
TID_SPELL_INFO_TORNADO: Drags enemy troops to its center while dealing damage over time, just like a magnet. A big, swirling, Tornado-y magnet.
TID_SPELL_INFO_VALKYRIE: Tough melee fighter, deals area damage around her. Swarm or horde, no problem! She can take them all out with a few spins.
TID_SPELL_INFO_WALLBREAKERS: A daring duo of dangerous dive bombers. Nothing warms a Wall Breaker's cold and undead heart like blowing up buildings.
TID_SPELL_INFO_WITCH: Summons Skeletons, shoots destructo beams, has glowing pink eyes that unfortunately don't shoot lasers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_WIZARD: The most awesome man to ever set foot in the Arena, the Wizard will blow you away with his handsomeness... and/or fireballs.
TID_SPELL_INFO_XBOW: Nice tower you got there. Would be a shame if this X-Bow whittled it down from this side of the Arena...
TID_SPELL_INFO_ZAP: Zaps enemies, briefly stunning them and dealing damage inside a small radius. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ZAPMACHINE: Sparky slowly charges up, then unloads MASSIVE area damage. Overkill isn't in her vocabulary.
TID_SPELL_INFO_ELECTRO_SPIRIT: Jumps on enemies, dealing Area Damage and stunning up to 9 enemy Troops. Locked in an eternal battle with Knight for the best mustache.
TID_LOADING_MAP: Waiting for Clan War to start...
TID_SPELL_INFO_WITCHMOTHER: Places a curse on enemy Troops with each attack. When a cursed Troop is destroyed, it turns into a building-targeting Hog that fights alongside the Mother Witch!\n\nShe also bakes great cookies.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOLDEN_KNIGHT: A warrior with luxurious hair and outstanding flexibility. Demonstrates his aerobics skills on demand.
TID_SPELL_INFO_SKELETON_KING: The King of the undead himself. He sometimes feels lonely (could be due to his non flattering features) and will summon friends to join him in the battle even after death. Tough guys have feelings too!
TID_SPELL_INFO_ARCHER_QUEEN: She is fast, deadly and hard to catch. Beware of her crossbow bolts and try not to blink - you might miss her!
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_SKELETON_KING: Collect souls of the fallen and bring them back from the dead!
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_ARCHER_QUEEN: Activates stealth mode and shoots her arrows faster!
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_GOLDEN_KNIGHT: Dashes towards his enemies and chain attacks everything in his path!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MIGHTY_MINER:
Walk softly ... and carry a big drill!

This Champion deals increasing Damage to his target and can switch lanes to escape combat or change attack plans.

This makes him not only the mightiest, but also the sneakiest Miner in the Arena.
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_MIGHTY_MINER: Mines underground to the opposite lane, leaving a bomb at the original location. Surprise!
TID_BADGE_COLLECTION_INFO_MASTERY: Unlock Mastery Badges from Card Masteries!
TID_BADGE_COLLECTION_INFO_ACHIEVEMENTS: Unlock Achievement Badges from Clan Wars and more!
TID_BADGE_COLLECTION_INFO_EXCLUSIVE: Unlock Special Badges from CRL and more!

TID_BADGE_INFO_CLASSIC_CHALLENGE_EARNED: Reach 12 wins in Classic Challenge to upgrade this badge!

TID_BADGE_INFO_CLAN_WAR_WINS_EARNED: Win Clan War battles to upgrade this badge!

TID_BADGE_INFO_DRAFT_UNEARNED: Win Draft Battles to earn this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_DRAFT_EARNED: Win Draft Battles to upgrade this badge!

TID_BADGE_INFO_MASTERY_EARNED: Complete Mastery Tasks to upgrade this badge!

TID_BADGE_INFO_LADDER_TOP: Finish with a Top 1000 ranking to upgrade this badge!

TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_2019: You reached <progress> wins in the 2019 CRL 20-win Challenge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_2021: You reached <progress> wins in the 2021 CRL 20-win Challenge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_BADGE_COMPLETE: This badge is at max level!
TID_BADGE_INFO_CLAN_WARS_VETERAN_EARNED: A symbol of your victories in the early days of Clan Wars
TID_BADGE_INFO_CLAN_DONATIONS_UNEARNED: Donate cards to your Clanmates to earn this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_CLAN_DONATIONS_EARNED: Donate cards to your Clanmates to upgrade this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_COLLECTION_LEVEL_UNEARNED: Collect and upgrade cards to earn this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_COLLECTION_LEVEL_EARNED: Collect and upgrade cards to upgrade this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_BANNER_COLLECTION_UNEARNE: Collect Battle Banners to earn this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_BANNER_COLLECTION_EARNED: Collect Battle Banners to upgrade this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_2V2_UNEARNED: Win 2v2 Battles to earn this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_2V2_EARNED: Win 2v2 Battles to upgrade this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_EMOTE_COLLECTION_UNEARNED: Collect emotes to earn this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_EMOTE_COLLECTION_EARNED: Collect emotes to upgrade this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_2022: You reached <progress> wins in the 2022 CRL 20-win Challenge!
TID_BADGE_USE_BANNER_NOT_OWNED: Unlock this badge to add it to your Battle Banner
TID_BADGE_USE_BANNER_ALREADY_SET: This Badge is already on your Battle Banner
TID_LEAGUE_ROAD_LEADERBOARD_ACTIVATION_I: The Hall of Fame will open when players reach Ultimate Champion League.
TID_SPELL_INFO_PHOENIX: This mystical creature will be reborn as an egg when destroyed. If it hatches, it returns to the fight! What an egg-cellent ability.\n\nBeing born again is tiring, so a hatched Phoenix will have slightly less Hitpoints and Damage (80% of its total).
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_MONK: Takes less Damage while deflecting projectiles back at the opponent!
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_SUPER_HOG_RIDER_: Terry and Pim Pim launch themselves into the air to attack from above!
TID_SPELL_INFO_SUPER_HOG_RIDER_TERRY: Terry and his trusty companion Pim Pim bring their unconventional Hog Riding skills to the Arena!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_ARCHERS: These Archers have been specially trained by Archer Queen herself as her personal sharpshooters. They deal more Damage to far away enemies with Power Shot!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_BARBARIAN: These Barbarians have grown stronger through Evolution!\n\nNot only do they now have glorious hair, but they also gain extra Speed and Hitspeed with each attack.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_BATS: What's cooler than Bats? VAMPIRE BATS. These creatures of the night heal with each attack and can increase their Hitpoints past their maximum!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_BATTLE_RAM: These Evolved Barbarians upgraded their hardware!\n\nEvolved Battle Ram deals damage and pushes enemies back during its charge. Once it connects to a building, it won't stop charging!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_BOMBER: Bomber has discovered the art of bomb bouncing. It's like skipping stones, but much more exciting.\n\nWith his new skill, Bomber will be able to hit multiple targets in a row with one attack!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_FIRECRACKER: Some Firecrackers just want to watch the world burn. Especially this one!\n\nThe Firecracker Evolution shoots a supercharged rocket that deals Damage per second to any enemies caught in her sparks.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_GOBLIN_BARREL: Evolved Goblin Barrel is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you’re going to get.\n\nWhenever Evolved Goblin Barrel is cast, a Decoy Barrel - filled with Decoy Goblins! - is thrown in the opposite lane.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_GOBLIN_GIANT: The bigger the sack, the bigger the... amount of Goblins spawned!\n\nAt low health, this Evolution will spawn a stream of Goblins. Take him out quickly!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_ICE_SPIRITS: Stay frosty when Ice Spirit is about! Literally. It now infuses a target with an Ice Blast spell, which deals freezing Area Damage over time.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_KNIGHT: Not only has his facial hair gotten an upgrade, the Knight's armor has, too! Evolved Knight has a special Shield that reduces Damage unless he is attacking.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_GOBLIN_DRILL: Let's play Whack-A-Drill!\n\nWhen deployed near enemy Crown Towers, Goblin Drill submerges and reappears around the tower as it takes damage, spawning Goblins each time.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_MORTAR: The new & improved Mortar uses patented Goblin Delivery Technology to rain noisy green destruction upon the Arena!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_ROYAL_GIANT: The Royal Giant Evolution is SO royal that he shoots giant golden cannon balls. Talk about privileged!\n\nHe also protects himself with powerful Recoil Damage generated by each attack.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_ROYAL_RECRUITS: Royal Recruits have been taking lessons from Prince. Once their shields have been broken, they will begin an epic charge!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_SKELETONS: When there's no more room in Spooky Town, the dead will walk the Arena!\n\nThis Evolution is a never-ending horde, with each Skeleton summoning another with every attack!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_TESLA: This Evolution is quite shocking!\n\nBad jokes aside, the evolved Tesla sends out an intermittent Electro Pulse, dealing Damage to any enemies caught in it.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_VALKYRIE: If you thought her battle cry was scary...wait until you see her new axe!\n\nEvolved Valkyrie draws all enemies towards her with each swing.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_WALLBREAKERS: Who let Wall Breakers into the gunpowder stores? They've run off with more explosives!\n\nIt's double trouble with this Evolution as they continue their attack on foot if their barrel is destroyed!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_WIZARD: Is it hot in here or is it just him?\n\nWizard is now outfitted with a fancy, fiery shield. Upon breaking, the shield explodes, dealing Damage and pushing nearby enemies back.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_ZAP: This Evolution comes gently zapping, zapping at your Arena floor...\n\nGet two Zaps for the cost of one, with the second Zap hitting a larger area!
TID_SPELL_INFO_LITTLE_PRINCE: Who let their nephew into the Arena?! This mischievous Royal gains Hit Speed when firing, as long as he stands still!\n\nHe may look weak, but he's always being watched over from afar...
TID_SPELL_INFO_CHAMP_GUARD: Little Prince's bodyguard. She watches from afar, charging into combat when the Royal rascal needs help.\n\nFriendly advice: Don't call her a babysitter.
TID_ABILITY_DESCRIPTION_LITTLE_PRINCE: Guardian charges into battle, dealing Charge Damage and pushing enemies back!
TID_SUPPORT_CARD_INFO_PRINCESS_TOWERS: The gold standard for Tower Troops. A Tower Princess can defend against anything, one arrow at a time.
TID_SUPPORT_CARD_INFO_KNIFE_THROWER: This Royal stockpiles her daggers when enemies are far away. When they dare to draw near, she unleashes her daggers in a rapid flurry!\n\nOh, one more thing. Don't call her Princess.
TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_2023: You reached <progress> wins in the 2023 20-Win Challenge!
TID_SPELL_INFO_WARM: Warms the Troops like a nice cup of hot cocoa. Toasty!
TID_SUPPORT_CARD_INFO_CANNONEER: Slow but powerful. What could be better than a giant cannon on your Tower?
TID_SPELL_INFO_DARK_MAGIC: You shall not pass! Unless there are lot of you...\n\nCreates a field of dark magic, damaging all enemy Troops and buildings within. More damage is dealt when fewer targets are in its area. Reduced damage to Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_SUSPICIOUS_BUSH: This invisible bush skulks towards the nearest building. Sus.\n\nIf Suspicious Bush reaches its target or gets destroyed by a spell, it surprises the enemy with Bush Goblins!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_DEMOLISHER: Boom goes the dynamite! Goblin Demolisher deals area damage and explodes on death. At low health, he charges towards the nearest building.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLIN_MACHINE: Goblin Machine has two arms for melee and one big rocket for faraway targets. Who let a baby drive this thing?
TID_SPELL_INFO_TRIWIZARD: All three Wizards in one neat package.
TID_SUPPORT_CARD_SPAWN_ABILITY_INFO: The Goblin Queen launches her brood of Baby Goblins across the river!
TID_SUPPPORT_CARD_INFO_GOBLIN_QUEEN_SPAW: The gold standard of masks. These Baby Goblins can defend against anything, one dart at a time.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_GOBLINCAGE: If you smell what the Goblin Brawler is cooking!\n\nEnemies that get close to the Evolved Goblin Cage are pulled inside and take damage over time until the enemy or cage is destroyed.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_PEKKA: Floats like a butterfly, stings like a bee. Evolved P.E.K.K.A has a giant soul-sucking sword that restores health after slaying her enemies.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_MEGAKNIGHT: Mega Knight’s other great love, besides his mustache, is boxing.\n\nWith each attack, this Evolution uppercuts his target and sends them flying toward the nearest enemy Crown Tower.
TID_SPELL_INFO_GOBLINSTEIN: It's ALIVE!\n\nMonster lumbers towards enemy buildings while Doctor waits to spring the trap. At the press of a button, Doctor electrifies the link between himself and Monster, frying nearby enemies!
TID_GOBLINSTEIN_ABILITY_INFO: Electrifies the link, damaging any enemies that get near. Shocking!
TID_BADGE_INFO_GOBLIN_JOURNEY: You reached Arena <progress> in the Goblin Queen's Journey!
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_ELECTRO_DRAGON: Can't stop, won't stop!\n\nEvolved Electro Dragon's attack will chain between targets infinitely and can hit the same target more than once. Additional Chained Attacks won't stun enemy targets, and they will not hit Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_MUSKETEER: She can hit a Royal Hog from thirty tiles away!\n\nEvolved Musketeer snipes targets across the Arena in a straight line ahead of her. She has limited Sniper Ammo with increased damage. She cannot snipe Crown Towers.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_CANNON: When this Evolution is deployed, it barrages both sides of the Arena, dealing damage and knocking enemies back.\n\nWho doesn't love the smell of gunpowder in the morning?
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_SNOWBALL: A rolling snowball gathers no Troops...unless it's Evolved!\n\nEvolved Giant Snowball gathers enemy Troops and rolls forward before breaking, which frees and slows the Troops down.
TID_SPELL_INFO_BERSERKER: It's surprising how often she needs her axes sharpened, but then again, if you liked hitting things as fast as her, so would you.
TID_SUPPORT_CARD_INFO_CHEF: Royal Chef cooks a mean Pancake and throws it to your Troop with the most Hitpoints, increasing their Level by 1.\n\nPancakes take longer to cook when he's attacking, and he serves Troops who haven't eaten yet.
TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_FINALIST_2024: You qualified for the CRL World Finals 2024!
TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_CHAMPION_2024: You won the CRL World Finals 2024!
TID_BADGE_INFO_CRL_2024: You reached <progress> wins in the 2024 CRL 20-win Challenge!
TID_SPELL_INFO_GIANT_BUFFER: Need your weapons sharpened? You've come to the right place.\n\nRune Giant enchants Troops closest to her, having them deal Bonus Damage every third attack. Only two Troops can be enchanted at once.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_RAGE_BARBARIAN: When Evolved Lumberjack is destroyed, his invisible Ghost seeks vengeance as long as it's in the pool of Lumberjack's Rage.\n\nWho you gonna call?
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_BLOWDART_GOBLIN: It's time to blow darts and chew gum, and he's all out of gum.\n\nEvolved Dart Goblin's darts Poison the area around his target until they're destroyed. The more he attacks a target, the deadlier the Poison gets.
TID_BADGE_INFO_CLASSIC_ROYALE_2025: You reached League <progress> in Retro Royale!
TID_SPELL_INFO_BOSS_BANDIT: The boss of the Forest Gang finally shows her face...kind of.\n\nBoss Bandit dashes to her targets and is invulnerable while dashing. When things get tough, her pair of grenades are at the ready.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MERGEMAIDEN: Behold the Spirit Empress, the First of Her Name, Protector of Spirits, Rider of Dragons.\n\nSummon her as a hard-hitting ground troop for 3 Elixir, or atop her majestic spirit dragon for 6 Elixir.
TID_SPELL_INFO_MERGEMAIDEN_GROUND: Behold the Spirit Empress, the First of Her Name, Protector of Spirits, Rider of Dragons.\n\nSummon her as a hard-hitting ground troop for 3 Elixir, or atop her majestic spirit dragon for 6 Elixir.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_AXEMAN: That's not an axe... This is an axe!\n\nEvolved Executioner's axe deals more damage to enemies in close quarters and pushes them back.
TID_BOSS_BANDIT_ABILITY_INFO: Briefly becomes invisible and teleports backwards!
TID_SPELL_INFO_MOVING_CANNON_REWORK: A Cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! At low health, it becomes a Cannon not on wheels.
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_SKELETON_BALLOON: Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Is it...two Barrels full of Skeletons?\n\nWhen Evolved Skeleton Barrel drops its Barrels, it deals Death Damage and spawns Skeletons. Upon taking enough Damage, a Barrel will drop early.
TID_BADGE_COLLECTION_INFO_SPECIAL: Your most prestigious badges live here
TID_SPELL_INFO_EVO_INFERNO_DRAGON: With the new and improved InfernoTank 2.0™, Inferno Dragon Evolution keeps its beam charged and deadly even when it has nothing to melt. But even the best tank doesn't last forever.
TID_BADGE_COLLECTION_INFO_YEAR_2025: Earn monthly badges to unlock a yearly badge
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_UNEARNED_202507: Earn by playing July Arenas or Ranked
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202507_1: You reached Seasonal Arena 4 in July!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202507_2: You reached Seasonal Arena 5 in July!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202507_3: You reached Ultimate Champion in July!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202508_1: You reached Seasonal Arena 4 in August!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202508_2: You reached Seasonal Arena 5 in August!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202508_3: You reached Ultimate Champion in August!
TID_BADGE_INFO_SEASONAL_202509_3: You reached Ultimate Champion in September!
TID_BADGE_INFO_MERGETACTICS_202506: Play Merge Tactics to upgrade this badge!
TID_BADGE_INFO_MERGETACTICS_202506_1: You've reached Bronze III in Merge Tactics!
TID_BADGE_INFO_MERGETACTICS_202506_2: You've reached Silver III in Merge Tactics!
TID_BADGE_INFO_MERGETACTICS_202506_3: You've reached Gold III in Merge Tactics!
TID_BADGE_INFO_MERGETACTICS_202506_4: You've reached Diamond in Merge Tactics!
TID_SPELL_INFO_FIRE_SPIRIT_HUT_REWORK: Furnace spawns one Fire Spirit at a time while dealing damage with its special cauldron brew.\n\nIt also makes great brick-oven pancakes.
